laboratory_examinations.findings: Confirmed the loss of a 1.1-Mb region in Xp21.1-p11.4, including XK and CYBB genes.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: PCR-based short tandem repeat sorted chimerism assay
laboratory_examinations.findings: Complete donor cell engraftment of the myeloid cell lineage with incomplete engraftment of the lymphoid lineage (21%).

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Culturing of blood samples for growth
laboratory_examinations.findings: Samples from each autologous donation cultured for aerobic, anaerobic, and fungal growth.
Two 5-ml/kg autologous RBC transfusions were required.
Continued mixed chimerism of the lymphoid cell line (65%).
